title: Bittersweet Lulu+Sinful Succulence Morgana

embed.description: Stayed up until 1 finishing this, and I really like how it turned out! This is my first time drawing more than one character in a drawing.. and I might do it more often.

body: Thinking about drawing an 11x14in Aether Wing Kaleee next because why not

replies.body: Cute!  I think Morg with her burnt cookies is jealous of Lulu's baking ability... :3
Oh, please! Morgana is actually baking, Lulu is just turning people into cupcakes! (Everyone knows that turning people into cupcakes is most totally cheating.) xD
This is wicked cute! Nicely done!
